form.receiveInvoiceQuestion: Should the email contain an invoice?
form.receiveLicensesQuestion: Should the email contain the licences?

invoiceNoLicenses.name: Email with invoice and no licenses
invoiceNoLicenses.descriptionText: The client will receive the invoice, but not the licenses.

noInvoiceWithLicenseSinglePlatform.name: Email without invoice and with licenses (single platform)
noInvoiceWithLicenseSinglePlatform.descriptionText: The client will not receive the invoice, but will receive licenses for a single platform (Marsupial).

noInvoiceWithLicenseMultiplePlatforms.name: Email without invoice and with licenses (multiple platforms)
noInvoiceWithLicenseMultiplePlatforms.descriptionText: The client will not receive the invoice, but will receive licenses for multiple platforms (Blink - Uses, Marsupial, OLB, Online Practice, OOSP and ORC).

invoiceWithLicenseSinglePlatform.name: Email with an invoice and licenses (single platform)
invoiceWithLicenseSinglePlatform.descriptionText: The client will receive the invoice and licenses for a single platform (Blink - Individual).

invoiceWithLicenseMultiplePlatforms.name: Email with an invoice and licenses (multiple platforms)
invoiceWithLicenseMultiplePlatforms.descriptionText: The client will receive the invoice and licenses for multiple platforms (Blink - Academies, Marsupial, OLB, Online Practice, OOSP and ORC).

returnOrder.name: Email for a return order
returnOrder.descriptionText: This is the template email for return orders.
